woodclick1.title: Wooden Axe
woodclick1.bought: if (!onetimers.woodclick1.checkIfCanBuy()) { return; }; resourcesPerClick.wood += 1; onetimers.woodclick1.isBought = true; resources.wood -= onetimers.woodclick1.wood; document.getElementById(this.id).classList.add('hidden'); updateVisuals();

unlockprestige.title: Unlock Prestige
unlockprestige.checkIfCanBuy: resources.food >= onetimers.unlockprestige.all && resources.stone >= onetimers.unlockprestige.all && resources.wood >= onetimers.unlockprestige.all
unlockprestige.bought: if (!onetimers.unlockprestige.checkIfCanBuy()) { return; }; onetimers.unlockprestige.isBought = true; resources.food -= onetimers.unlockprestige.all; resources.stone -= onetimers.unlockprestige.all; resources.wood -= onetimers.unlockprestige.all; document.getElementById(this.id).classList.add('hidden'); unlockPrestige(); updateVisuals();
